entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
